rows: The index of the supply-demand type, $x=1,2, \ldots, X$
The index of job or customer, $n=1,2, \ldots, N$
The index of the SRUs, $r=1,2, \ldots, R$
The index of the operation for job $n, k, n k=1,2, \ldots, K_{n}$
The index of the machine for SRU $r, m, r m=1,2, \ldots, M_{r}$
The set of jobs with shape $\left(X, N^{r}\right)$
The set of SRUs with shape $\left(X, R^{r}\right)$
The number of jobs or customers
The number of jobs with type $x$
The number of SRUs with type $x$
The number of the operations for jobs with type $x$
The number of the machines for SRUs with type $x$
The number of the operations for job $n$
The number of the machines for SRU $r$
The $n$ th operation processed by $M_{n m}$
The processing time of operation $O_{n k}$ on $M_{n m}$
The beginning time of operation $O_{n k}$ on $M_{n m}$
The ending time of operation $O_{n k}$ on $M_{n m}$
The transportation time from the SRU $r$ to customer $n$
The processing cost per unit time of $M_{n m}$ to deal with the operation $O_{n k}$
Transportation cost per unit time from SRU $r$ to the customer $n$

headers: If job $n$ is assigned to SRU $r, A_{n r}=1$; otherwise, $A_{n r}=0$
rows: If $M_{n n}$ is selected to process $O_{n k}, B_{n k r m}=1$; otherwise, $B_{n k r m}=0$
If the type of job $n$ is $x, G_{n n}=1$; otherwise, $G_{n n}=0$
If the type of SRU $r$ is $x H_{n n}=1$; otherwise, $H_{n n}=0$
If $O_{g n n}$ is processed directly after $O_{g n n}$ on $M_{n n}, Q_{g n n}=1$; otherwise $Q_{g n n}=0$

Wilcoxon signed rank test comparing EDA-TS with EDA and NSGA-II.
Wilcoxon signed rank test comparing EDA-TS with EDA-VNS and H-GA-TS.

Where $c r$ and $m r$ respectively represent crossover rate and mutation rate, $t$ is the maximum number of iterations of TS in H-GA-TS, and other parameters are consistent with EDA-TS. The parameters of each experiment are combined separately according to the orthogonal table L16 $\left(4^{5}\right), L_{9}\left(3^{3}\right), L_{16}\left(4^{5}\right)$, and $L_{16}\left(4^{5}\right)$. Like the parameter experiment of EDA-TS, each parameter combination of every algorithm is independently run 30 times on instance SDMK17 and set the stop criterion to 100 s .
Average C-metric of EDA-TS and the variants.
Wilcoxon signed rank test comparing EDA-TS with the variants.
